Goal
=====

Replay some sweet NES tetris 

[![Youtube link to video demo]()](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UGB5BghoFMc)


Requirement
========

Clone [this forked repo](https://github.com/trochr/game-and-watch-retro-go)

Example games
=====
See an example [here](https://trochr.github.io/Nes-Tetris-Replay/?sl=14&)

More in [Notable Games.md](https://github.com/trochr/Nes-Tetris-Replay/blob/master/Notable%20Games.md) file
